name: Solar System Project by Chris
description:
This is my Solar System project. The modifications I made include:

1) Adding a satellite to orbit Earth with a 'Sputnik sound'.

2) Adding Mars with its 2 moons, and a sound from Mars (created a new material for the moon(s)) to orbit the Sun.

3) Adding Venus to orbit the sun

4) Adding Saturn with its rings. Used a code and tutorial I found online to assist me with this. 

Game Credits:

Created by Christopher Ralph
